Trade/Device Name(s): SuperCheck Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring System
SuperCheck Pro Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for SuperCheck Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood using amperometric detection.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from various sites for self-testing by individuals with diabetes mellitus at home as an aid in monitoring diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
